Utils Modülü

Bu modül, yardımcı araçları içerir.

Password Hasher

Password Hashing Utilities Provides secure password hashing using bcrypt or fallback to PBKDF2

class utils.password_hasher.PasswordHasher[kaynak]

Bases: object

Secure password hashing utility

Uses bcrypt if available, otherwise falls back to PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA256

static hash_password(password: str) → str[kaynak]

Hash a password securely

Parametreler:

password – Plain text password

Dönüşler:

Hashed password string

static verify_password(stored_hash: str, provided_password: str) → bool[kaynak]

Verify a password against a stored hash

Parametreler:

  • stored_hash – The stored password hash

  • provided_password – The password to verify

Dönüşler:

True if password matches, False otherwise

utils.password_hasher.hash_password(password: str) → str[kaynak]

Hash a password (convenience function)

utils.password_hasher.verify_password(stored_hash: str, provided_password: str) → bool[kaynak]

Verify a password (convenience function)

Kullanım Örnekleri

from utils.password_hasher import hash_password, verify_password

# Şifre hashleme
password = "my_secure_password"
hashed = hash_password(password)

# Şifre doğrulama
is_valid = verify_password(hashed, password)
print(f"Şifre geçerli: {is_valid}")

Helpers

Helper functions for the Class Scheduling Program

utils.helpers.setup_logging()[kaynak]

Configure logging.

Prefer the project’s centralized logging configuration in logging_config.setup_logging. Falls back to a simple error-only file handler if that module isn’t available.
